intro: Dehaasia velutinosa, commonly known as the velvet leaf plant, is a flowering plant species native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its soft, velvety leaves that give it its common name. It produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Dehaasia velutinosa is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and modest flowering display.
